userProfile.recentChallenges: Most off-periods due to mental/emotional stress rather than injury. Minor abdominal hernia earlier this year but not limiting.
ultimateGoals: Build to 80–100 mpw for at least a short period
Regain ability to run 5:00–6:00 pace for workouts and races
Complete a 50-mile route in Austin when weather cools
userProfile.structurePreference: open to monotony or variety depending on what makes sense

trainingPhase: Phase 3: Elevate volume and workout specificity (75–85 mpw)
request: Design a week that includes 2 workouts, 3 doubles, and supports 80+ mile training. Workouts should target threshold and light speed or hill strength. Long run should be 18–20 miles if possible.
